name: Spider Monkey: Slide and Jump!
description:
Spider Monkey is the new physics based game from the creators of #1 iPhone FREE APP Racing Penguin, rated 5 stars!

Touch the trees to grab them. Use your arms to jump from one tree to the other. Grab stars to unlock new levels

Features

+ Simple touch controls
+ Physics based
+ 4 worlds and 32 levels
+ Touch to grab the trees and touch again to release it!

Get it while it is FREE!

Privacy Policy: https://www.topfreegames.com/games/spidermonkey/legal/privacy
